question: Transiting Explanted Survey Satellite was launched by NASA for searching explants .Which of the following key features is true regarding TESS mission? 1.It was led by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. 2.It will use transit method to detect exoplanets. 3.In April, 2018 TESS has discovered a third small planet outside our solar system. Select the correct codes from the options given below:
explanation: The Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite is a NASA mission that will look for planets orbiting the brightest stars in Earthâ€™s sky. The mission will monitor at least 200,000 stars for signs of exoplanets.
